lines.text: Creation of a spectrum by refraction
Occurs because different wavelengths refract at different angles
Since light emerges from raindrop at different angles
Observer sees a color depending on location

secText:
Essential Question:
How can we apply dispersion to real-world examples?

Enduring Understandings:
1. [OBJ:expsec_u269:Dispersion] is when light separates into the colors (which are composed of specific wavelengths of light) that make it up.
